sentences.sentence: Water was slopping around in the bottom of the boat.
He got out of the bath, slopping water over the sides.
sentences.translation: 他从浴缸里出来，水也跟着漫出来。

sentences.sentence: What shall I do to keep Frederick from seeing all this slopping about?
sentences.translation: 我该怎么做才能不让弗雷德里克看到这一切呢？
